sentences.en: A surrogate pair can represent a base character or a combining character.
sentences.cn: 代理项对可表示基字符或组合字符.

sentences.en: Arms control should not be made into a surrogate for peace.
sentences.cn: 武器控制不应该用来替代和平。

sentences.en: Fiction is a poor surrogate for real experience.
sentences.cn: 小说中的事远逊于实际体验.

sentences.en: For some people, reading travel books is a surrogate for actual travel.
sentences.cn: 对某些人来说, 读游记可代替真正的旅行.

sentences.en: I do not know if your company has surrogate in our country.
sentences.cn: 我不知道贵公司在我国是否有代理.

sentences.en: Industrial plumbing fixtures are the surrogate Pacific for the reef.
sentences.cn: 对于这些礁石来说,是工业管道装置替代了太平洋.

sentences.en: Ishmael was Abraham's son by using Hagar as the Surrogate mother.
sentences.cn: 以实玛利是从夏甲给亚伯拉罕生的儿子.

sentences.en: Leningrad was the third alien city to offer him a surrogate home.
sentences.cn: 列宁格勒是他在异地安家的第三个外国城市。

sentences.en: Litigation trust is different from litigation take - on, litigation surrogate and credit - right trust.
sentences.cn: 诉讼信托不同诉讼担当 、 诉讼代理和债权信托.

sentences.en: Machine technology is a temporary surrogate for life technology.
sentences.cn: 机器科技只不过是生命科技的临时代理而已.

sentences.en: Many commercials, for example, attempt to provide surrogate reference groups.
sentences.cn: 例如:许多商业广告力图提供一些代理参照体.

sentences.en: Martin had become Howard Cosell's surrogate son.
sentences.cn: 马丁代为当起了霍华德·科塞尔的儿子。

sentences.en: Surrogate model is a key element of the multidisciplinary design optimization ( MDO ) .
sentences.cn: 代理模型是多 学科 设计优化的关键技术之一.

sentences.en: The cat acted as a surrogate mum to the chicks.
sentences.cn: 这只貓当起了小鸡的妈妈来.

sentences.en: There are multiplayer consign and surrogate relationship in our media.
sentences.cn: 我国媒介组织内存在多层次的委托—代理关系.

words.tran_cn: 代理；代用品；遗嘱检验法官
代理；指定某人为自己的代理人

phrases.tran_cn: n. 代孕母亲；替身母亲

trans.tran_en: a surrogate person or thing is one that takes the place of someone or something else

trans.tran_cn: 代理, 代用品, 代理人
